entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 8:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain in the morning then to rain showers at times heavy near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
